data.persona: I own this land that the indolent soldiers are camping on. They have been here all summer. If I had known, I would not have sown any crops this spring. Now we are approaching harvest time and my fields are trampled. I am not sure how my family will survive this fall. I have worked my whole life for this land, and now it is ruining me.
data.description:
You are in the Grand hall of the City.
A great massive hall with chairs and tables. several door ways line the walls of the hall leading to other places. A massive front door that is slightly swung open.
There's a shops, a hall, a chair, a table, a door, a market, and a benches here.
The person is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a boot and a Overalls, and wielding a shovel.

data.short_motivation: I need to put on new boots because these ones have a hole in them
data.mid_motivation: I must attempt to fix the damage left by the indolent soldiers
data.long_motivation: I need to provide for my family and harvest my crops
